text.magic_lanterns.page0: Light is a wonderful element that allowed life to flourish when the world was still young. If one could harness such power, many great things could be achieved. After many hours of study, I finally found a way to imbue a normal lantern with different catalysts to manipulate its effects. If my theory is correct an altar will be required.
text.magic_lanterns.page1: The lantern maker can be crafted in a crafting table, to imbue a lantern the altar will require up to 10 catalysts and a lantern block placed on top of it, if the recipe is correct particles will appear!
text.magic_lanterns.page2:
Effects: Applies regeneration to nearby entities / crops around the lantern grow faster

Recipe: egg + melon (block) + golden_apple + sugar cane + bone meal
text.magic_lanterns.page3:
Effects: Lights up a giant area below it by spawning sparks, each feral lantern can spawn a maximum of 100

Recipe: glowstone + jack-o-lantern + fire charge + blaze powder + gold ingot
text.magic_lanterns.page4:
Effects: Makes nearby mobs fall in love

Recipe: diamond + rabbit foot + golden carrot + beetroot + life lantern + honey bottle
text.magic_lanterns.page5:
Effects: Cries if you get close / screams and applies nausea if you get too close

Recipe: ghast tear + warped roots + flint + pufferfish + ink sac
text.magic_lanterns.page6:
Effects: Slows nearby mobs

Recipe: cobweb + snowball + packed ice + quartz
text.magic_lanterns.page7:
Effects: Turns nearby mobs directly into experience (max health / 2)

Recipe: shulker shell + paper + snowball + phantom membrane
text.magic_lanterns.page8:
Effects: Pushes all living entities except players away 

Recipe: warped fungus + pufferfish + iron door + obsidian
text.magic_lanterns.page9:
Effects: Keeps all living entities except the player confined to an area

Recipe: warding lantern + fishing rod + cobweb + chain
text.magic_lanterns.page10:
Effects: Applies the wither effect in a large area around it

Recipe: wither rose + soul sand + firework star+ coal
text.magic_lanterns.page11:
Effects: Applies the slow fall effect in a large area around it

Recipe: phantom membrane + soul torch + snow block + white wool
